welcome_message_body: Welcome to Inglewood, where the charm of our vibrant community and rich cultural heritage awaits you. Explore our diverse neighborhoods, world-class entertainment, and delicious cuisine â€“ we hope you enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Stuff I Eat
restaurants.description: Stuff I Eat is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Inglewood.
restaurants.address: 114 N Market St (btwn E Regent & Queen St), Inglewood, CA 90301

restaurants.name: In-N-Out Burger
restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Inglewood.
restaurants.address: 3411 W Century Blvd (at Club Dr), Inglewood, CA 90303

restaurants.name: The Serving Spoon
restaurants.description: The Serving Spoon is a southern food restaurant located in Inglewood.
restaurants.address: 1403 Centinela Ave (at Enterprise Ave), Inglewood, CA 90302

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including Southwest, Delta, and Frontier.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines, including Air Canada, Air China, and Air France.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including American, JetBlue, and Copa.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines, including British Airways, Qantas, and Emirates.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including United, Hawaiian, and Sun Country.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including Alaska, Spirit, and Allegiant.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including Air New Zealand, Avianca, and Volaris.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including Alaska, United, and ANA.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including American, Lufthansa, and Southwest.

wifi.note: No time limit, but may require reconnection every 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
